These crops have only been widely consumed for a couple decades - that's a mere blip in scientific terms when assessing human health impacts.

What we do know is alarming. Independent studies have linked GMOs to organ damage, infertility, immune dysfunction, and even cancer in lab animals. Glyphosate, the main herbicide used on GMO crops, is a probable human carcinogen according to the World Health Organization. And GMO crops are leading to an epidemic of resistant superweeds and pests, requiring ever-increasing amounts of toxic chemicals.

Meanwhile, the revolving door between the FDA and biotech companies means industry cronies are green-lighting these frankenfoods with no rigorous safety testing. They're experimenting on our health for their profits. It's unconscionable.

We must heed the precautionary principle and halt the production and consumption of GMOs until they can be proven safe through long-term, independent testing. Our health depends on it. The science is not settled on this - anyone who claims otherwise is either misinformed or willfully ignorant. We cannot afford to gamble with people's lives.
